body:
Bug was found by @luismartins-td.

The recent exporter change introduced a regression that manifests if the appdebug user matches the app user. This in itself is a separate issue we have to find a solution for. I'll file a separate issue for it.

```
DDL	"create table product(sku varbinary(128),description varbinary(128),price bigint,primary key(sku))"	map[]	0	""	none	0.000000	0.000000	0	0	"Uncaught panic for Sql: "create table product(sku varbinary(128),description varbinary(128),price bigint,primary key(sku))", BindVars: {}:
Reuse of exported var name: Mysql

/usr/local/go/src/log/log.go:352 (0x65c25b)
/usr/local/go/src/expvar/expvar.go:278 (0x79253e)
/vt/src/vitess.io/vitess/go/stats/export.go:86 (0x7b82e5)
/vt/src/vitess.io/vitess/go/stats/export.go:110 (0x7bd1c3)
/vt/src/vitess.io/vitess/go/stats/timings.go:206 (0x7bd193)
/vt/src/vitess.io/vitess/go/vt/servenv/exporter.go:394 (0xa54740)
/vt/src/vitess.io/vitess/go/vt/vttablet/tabletserver/tabletenv/stats.go:51 (0xe2e221)

/vt/src/vitess.io/vitess/go/vt/vttablet/tabletserver/query_executor.go:139 (0xe8c167)
/vt/src/vitess.io/vitess/go/vt/vttablet/tabletserver/tabletserver.go:992 (0xeb60c8)
```

title: regression: panic in vttablet
